title: [Store] Bard Bundle Does Not Apply a Discount
body: If you already own Bard the bundle does not subtract his cost? Effectively making the skin cost the 1400 ip or what have you.

replies.body: Jumping in here.  New skins typically don't go on sale close to their release date.  Aside from 1350's and 3250's which get an short window of a discount.  The New Champion + New Skin bundle that are available essentially apply the discount to the champion.  So if you unlock the champion with IP, the skin would be the regular price.

I assumed as much. It still seems like the champion should subtract from the price whether at a discounted rate or not. As in the bundle should then cost the 975 and not the like 1462 or whatever it actually is. Just an oddity I suppose, nothing big. I purchased the skin itself anyway.
